title: Our Origins and Specialized Services
description: Over the last 7 years we have worked with 300+ clients on APIs, Intermediates and across 12 countries.

title: Manufacturing Focus
description: Our key focus is we identify, develop and supply import substitution products. Proudly manufactured in India for the world. Our products are compliant with EU-GMP, USFDA, KFDA, JFDA regulations.

title: Geographic Presence
description: Serving clients across 10+ countries with high-quality pharmaceutical ingredients, delivering global solutions with local expertise.
